TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DrawTreeNodeEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用事件來自訂外觀中的節點使用主控描繪控制項。Use the event to customize the appearance of nodes in a control using owner drawing. 就會引發事件控制其屬性設定為或及其節點會顯示或更新。The event is raised by a control when its property is set to or and a node is displayed or updated. 傳遞至事件處理常式包含要繪製以及提供方法來協助您繪製節點的節點的相關資訊。The passed to the event handler contains information about the node to draw as well as providing methods to help you draw the node. 使用或屬性，以擷取要繪製之節點的相關資訊。Use the or properties to retrieve information about the node to draw. 使用屬性來進行實際所指定的區域內繪製屬性。Use the property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the property. 若要繪製不需要是繪製的擁有者節點的作業系統，請設定屬性`true`。To make the operating system draw a node that does not need to be owner drawn, set the property to `true`. 當屬性設定為，區域由屬性包含僅限節點的標籤部分。When the property is set to , the area indicated by the property includes the label portion of the node only. 當屬性設定為、區域包含整個節點，包含通常用於圖示、 核取方塊，加號和減號，區域和線條連接的節點。When the property is set to , the area includes the entire node, including the area typically used for icons, checkboxes, plus and minus signs, and lines connecting the nodes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何自訂使用主控描繪控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 控制項在範例中顯示的標準節點標籤旁邊的選擇性節點標籤。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 使用指定節點的標記屬性。Node tags are specified using the property. 控制項也會使用自訂色彩，包括自訂的醒目提示色彩。The control also uses custom colors, including a custom highlight color. 您可以自訂的大部分色彩設定色彩屬性，但不提供為屬性選取項目醒目提示色彩。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，預設選取項目反白顯示矩形會擴充只周圍節點標籤。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 主控描繪必須用於繪製節點標記，並繪製自訂反白顯示矩形大，足以包含節點標籤。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 在範例中，處理常式節點標記和自訂選取反白顯示手動事件繪製。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tags and the custom selection highlight manually. 未選取的節點不需要自訂。Unselected nodes do not need customization. 對於這些屬性設定為`true`，以便他們將會由作業系統繪製。For these, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system. 此外，處理常式事件提供的點擊測試。Additionally, a handler for the event provides hit-testing. 根據預設，您可以選取節點，只能透過按一下其標籤周圍的區域。By default, a node can be selected only by clicking the region around its label. 事件處理常式選取的節點，在此區域內，或節點的標記，周圍區域內任何位置按一下，如果有的話。The event handler selects a node that is clicked anywhere within this region or within the region around a node tag, if present. [!code-cpp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CPP/treeviewownerdraw.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CS/treeviewownerdraw.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TreeViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/VB/treeviewownerdraw.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public DrawTreeNodeEventArgs (System.Drawing.Graphics graphics, System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode node, System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds, System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeStates state);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Drawing.Graphics graphics, class System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode node, valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeStates state) cil managed
public: DrawTreeNodeEventArgs(System::Drawing::Graphics ^ graphics, System::Windows::Forms::TreeNode ^ node, System::Drawing::Rectangle bounds, System::Windows::Forms::TreeNodeStates state);

span.span: The surface on which to draw.

param.name: state
param.span: 值的位元組合，表示所要繪製 的目前狀態。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values indicating the current state of the to draw.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Drawing.Rectangle Bounds { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle Bounds
Public ReadOnly Property Bounds As Rectangle
public: property System::Drawing::Rectangle Bounds { System::Drawing::Rectangle get(); };

summary.span: 取得所要繪製 的大小和位置。

span.span: Gets the size and location of the to draw.
A that represents the bounds of the to draw.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所指定的位置是相對於左上角控制項。The location specified by this property is relative to the upper-left corner of the control. 當屬性設定為，所指定的區域屬性是在其中一個節點可以按一下來選取它的區域。When the property is set to , the area specified by the property is the region in which a node can be clicked to select it. 如果您繪製這個點擊的測試區域之外，您應選取一個節點，在按下的可見區域時提供自己的程式碼。If you draw outside this hit test region, you should provide your own code for selecting a node when its visible area is clicked. 您也可以提供您自己的點擊的測試碼屬性設定為。You may also want to provide your own hit test code when the property is set to . 在此模式中，屬性包含整個節點的整個寬度控制，而不是只點擊的測試區域。In this mode, the property encompasses the whole node across the entire width of the control, rather than the just hit test region. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何自訂使用主控描繪控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 控制項在範例中顯示的標準節點標籤旁邊的選擇性節點標籤。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 使用指定節點的標記屬性。Node tags are specified using the property. 控制項也會使用自訂色彩，包括自訂的醒目提示色彩。The control also uses custom colors, including a custom highlight color. 您可以自訂的大部分色彩設定色彩屬性，但不提供為屬性選取項目醒目提示色彩。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，預設選取項目反白顯示矩形會擴充只周圍節點標籤。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 主控描繪必須用於繪製節點標記，並繪製自訂反白顯示矩形大，足以包含節點標籤。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 在範例中，處理常式節點標記和自訂選取反白顯示手動事件繪製。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tags and the custom selection highlight manually. 未選取的節點不需要自訂。Unselected nodes do not need customization. 對於這些屬性設定為`true`，以便他們將會由作業系統繪製。For these, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system. 完整的範例，請參閱概觀參考主題。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CPP/treeviewownerdraw.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CS/treeviewownerdraw.cs#3)] [!code-vb[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/VB/treeviewownerdraw.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool DrawDefault { get; set; }
.property instance bool DrawDefault
Public Property DrawDefault As Boolean
public: property bool DrawDefault { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否應該由作業系統繪製 ，而不是由擁有者繪製。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the should be drawn by the operating system rather than being owner drawn.

value.span: 如果應該由作業系統繪製節點，則為 ；如果要由事件處理常式繪製節點，則為 。

span.span: if the node should be drawn by the operating system; if the node will be drawn in the event handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為`true`不要在您處理自訂的節點事件。Set this property to `true` for nodes that you do not want to customize when you handle the event. 比方說，這是很有用時您想要自訂其特定狀態中的節點。For example, this is useful when you want to customize only nodes that are in a specific state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. 在範例中，處理常式事件繪製節點標記和自訂反白顯示色彩手動選取的節點。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tag and a custom highlight color manually for the selected node. 未選取的節點不需要自訂。Nodes that are not selected do not need customization. 未選取的節點，屬性設定為`true`，這樣它們會由作業系統繪製，沒有自訂的外觀。For unselected nodes, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system and will not have a customized appearance. > [!NOTE] > 如果您繪製節點以及手動設定屬性`true`，部分或所有您可能會覆寫作業系統。If you draw a node manually and also set the property to `true`, some or all of what you draw may be overwritten by the operating system. 完整的範例，請參閱概觀參考主題。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CPP/treeviewownerdraw.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CS/treeviewownerdraw.cs#3)] [!code-vb[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/VB/treeviewownerdraw.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Drawing.Graphics Graphics { get; }

Public ReadOnly Property Graphics As Graphics
public: property System::Drawing::Graphics ^ Graphics { System::Drawing::Graphics ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得用來繪製 的 物件。

span.span: Gets the object used to draw the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供屬性和顯示裝置上繪製的有用的方法。The class provides properties and methods useful for drawing on the display device. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何自訂使用主控描繪控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 控制項在範例中顯示的標準節點標籤旁邊的選擇性節點標籤。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 使用指定節點的標記屬性。Node tags are specified using the property. 控制項也會使用自訂色彩，包括自訂的醒目提示色彩。The control also uses custom colors, including a custom highlight color. 您可以自訂的大部分色彩設定色彩屬性，但不提供為屬性選取項目醒目提示色彩。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，預設選取項目反白顯示矩形會擴充只周圍節點標籤。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 主控描繪必須用於繪製節點標記，並繪製自訂反白顯示矩形大，足以包含節點標籤。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 在範例中，處理常式節點標記和自訂選取反白顯示手動事件繪製。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tags and the custom selection highlight manually. 未選取的節點不需要自訂。Unselected nodes do not need customization. 對於這些屬性設定為`true`，以便他們將會由作業系統繪製。For these, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system. 完整的範例，請參閱概觀參考主題。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CPP/treeviewownerdraw.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CS/treeviewownerdraw.cs#3)] [!code-vb[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/VB/treeviewownerdraw.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode Node { get; }
.property instance class System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode Node
Public ReadOnly Property Node As TreeNode
public: property System::Windows::Forms::TreeNode ^ Node { System::Windows::Forms::TreeNode ^ get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來存取繪製的物件。Use this property to access the object to draw. 這非常有用時屬性不提供以符合您需求的適當資訊。This is useful when the property does not provide adequate information to meet your needs. 屬性會提供您可以使用，例如，若要判斷節點是否為選取、 核取，或已取得焦點的基本狀態資訊。The property provides only basic state information that you can use, for example, to determine whether a node is selected, checked, or focused. 屬性，相反地，可讓您存取的所有成員物件。The property, on the other hand, allows you to access all members of the object. 您必須在節點直接存取，比方說，當您想要判斷其展開狀態。You must access the node directly, for example, when you want to determine its expansion state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何自訂使用主控描繪控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 控制項在範例中顯示的標準節點標籤旁邊的選擇性節點標籤。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 使用指定節點的標記屬性。Node tags are specified using the property. 控制項也會使用自訂色彩，包括自訂的醒目提示色彩。The control also uses custom colors, including a custom highlight color. 您可以自訂的大部分色彩設定色彩屬性，但不提供為屬性選取項目醒目提示色彩。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，預設選取項目反白顯示矩形會擴充只周圍節點標籤。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 主控描繪必須用於繪製節點標記，並繪製自訂反白顯示矩形大，足以包含節點標籤。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 在範例中，處理常式節點標記和自訂選取反白顯示手動事件繪製。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tags and the custom selection highlight manually. 未選取的節點不需要自訂。Unselected nodes do not need customization. 對於這些屬性設定為`true`，以便他們將會由作業系統繪製。For these, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system. 完整的範例，請參閱概觀參考主題。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CPP/treeviewownerdraw.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CS/treeviewownerdraw.cs#3)] [!code-vb[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/VB/treeviewownerdraw.vb#3)]

summary.span: 取得所要繪製 的目前狀態。

span.span: Gets the current state of the to draw.

value.span: 值的位元組合，表示 的目前狀態。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values indicating the current state of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來檢查是否繪製的物件處於特定狀態。Use this property to check whether the object to draw is in a particular state. 這個屬性會提供僅與節點有關的基本狀態資訊。This property provides only basic state information about the node. 您可以使用這個屬性，例如，若要判斷節點是否為選取、 核取，或已取得焦點。You can use this property, for example, to determine whether a node is selected, checked, or focused. 如果您需要以瞭解詳細資訊，擷取透過節點屬性。If you need to know more, retrieve the node through the property. 例如，若要判斷是否已展開節點，您必須擷取節點，並檢查屬性。For example, to determine whether the node is expanded, you must retrieve the node and check the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何自訂使用主控描繪控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 控制項在範例中顯示的標準節點標籤旁邊的選擇性節點標籤。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 使用指定節點的標記屬性。Node tags are specified using the property. 控制項也會使用自訂色彩，包括自訂的醒目提示色彩。The control also uses custom colors, including a custom highlight color. 您可以自訂的大部分色彩設定色彩屬性，但不提供為屬性選取項目醒目提示色彩。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，預設選取項目反白顯示矩形會擴充只周圍節點標籤。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 主控描繪必須用於繪製節點標記，並繪製自訂反白顯示矩形大，足以包含節點標籤。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 在範例中，處理常式節點標記和自訂選取反白顯示手動事件繪製。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tags and the custom selection highlight manually. 未選取的節點不需要自訂。Unselected nodes do not need customization. 對於這些屬性設定為`true`，以便他們將會由作業系統繪製。For these, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system. 完整的範例，請參閱概觀參考主題。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CPP/treeviewownerdraw.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CS/treeviewownerdraw.cs#3)] [!code-vb[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/VB/treeviewownerdraw.vb#3)]
